text: Nicholas David Rowland Cassavetes (born May 21, 1959) is an American actor, director, and writer. He was born in New York City. He was known for directing the 2004 romantic drama The Notebook. His parents were Gena Rowlands and John Cassavetes. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Interview with UGO.com Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Actors from New York City
title: Nick Cassavetes
